ISSUE.TITLE: Bump Django to v5.2.0
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Proposed Changes Upgrade Django from v5.2-beta1 to v5.2.0. ### Justification Django v5.2.0 is now available.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #16058: Fix circular import involving register_model_view() (#19076)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #19084 from netbox-community/19083-django-52 Closes #19083: Upgrade Django to v5.2.0
